name: Trainz Plus DLC - UP AC4400CW #5982-6081
detailed_description:
The 5982-6081 Series was delivered to the Union Pacific Railroad between the years of 2004/2005. This delivery was the very last AC4400CW order from GE for the UP. This model is a representation of this series between the years 2010 to current. Cabs are exactly created to prototype.

Features…

4 different skins
Realistic Specular/normal map texture effects
Functioning Cab Signal
Air Hoses and MU Cables
Functioning and interactive computer screen
Functioning dynamic brakes
Auto Running Numbers
Road specific highly detailed cab view
Scripted cab functions
Realistic in-cab sounds
Openable engine compartment doors,
Openable Front and Rear cab doors,
Highest qualify GE 7FDL engine sound recording in Trainz

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
